article.title: R4 to Support Counter-Improvised Explosive Device Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: R4 Incorporated, Eatontown, New Jersey, was awarded about $9 million for contractor logistic support on various improvised explosive device defeat/protect force equipment at approximately 60 locations.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Warren, Michigan, is the contracting activity.
